text: Dafydd ap Gruffydd (11 July (?) 1238 â€“ 3 October 1283) was Prince of Wales from 11 December 1282 until on 3 October 1283. His execution was ordered by King Edward I of England. The execution was especially gruesome. Daffyd was the last independent ruler of Wales.Smith, J. Beverley 1998. Llywelyn ap Gruffudd, Prince of Wales. Cardiff. == References == Category:Welsh people Category:Executed people Category:1238 births Category:1283 deaths
title: Dafydd ap Gruffydd
